name: 3sstr4g
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
-| wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
-| wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Substitution of equality into both sides of a subclass relationship. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 26-Jan-2007.)
